virtual std::vector<glw::IAnimation*> glr::models::Model::getAnimations ( ) const
virtual

Sets the current animation. If nullptr is sent in as the animation, then no animation will be used when rendering this model.

Parameters
animationThe animation to use as the current animation.

Implements glr::models::IModel.

virtual void glr::models::Model::render ( shaders::IShaderProgram *  shader)
virtual

Will render the model through OpenGL.

The model will render each mesh individually. Each mesh may have a corresponding material, texture, and animation, all of which will be bound to the shader for use when rendering the mesh.

Parameters
shaderThe shader to use to render this model.

Implements glr::models::IRenderable.

virtual

Implements glr::models::IModel.

virtual

Stop the currently playing animation for this model.

Implements glr::models::IModel.
